image.title: The Sonic Newsdriver
image.description: Selected Doctor Who related news stories delivered sonically! Hosted by Louis Trapani (of Doctor Who: Podshock). Selected Doctor Who, Torchwood, Sarah Jane Adventures, and other related news. A production of Art Trap Productions. See other podcasts at arttrap.com.

channel.itunes:author: Louis Trapani
channel.itunes:subtitle: Selected DOCTOR WHO related news stories delivered sonically! From Doctor Who to Torchwood to Sarah Jane Adventures. Hosted by Louis Trapani of Doctor Who: Podshock!
channel.itunes:summary: Selected DOCTOR WHO related news stories delivered sonically! Each episode running roughly 10-15 minutes focusing on various Doctor Who related news. Selected Doctor Who, Torchwood, Sarah Jane Adventures, and other related news. It fills the gap left between Doctor Who: Podshock episodes with the latest news from around the world related to our favourite longest running science fiction series of time and space. Hosted by Louis Trapani of Doctor Who: Podshock.
channel.itunes:keywords: Doctor Who, News, British, Dr Who, Sci-Fi, science fiction, television, BBC, Art Trap Productions, Sonic Newsdriver, Louis Trapani, Torchwood, Sarah Jane Adventures

item.title: Sonic Newsdriver 20110708
item.description:
The Sonic Newsdriver 20110708
Selected Doctor Who related news delivered sonically.

For Earth-date: Friday, the 8th of July 2011

In this episode: Torchwood Comes to Starz on Friday, John Barrowman as the Doctor, Speaking of Kilts, A Doctor - Not The Doctor in Torchwood, Great Leaping Doctors - Batman, Farewell to Beth Willis, Doctor Who is on for 2012 or is it and more!

Hosted by Louis Trapani
